description: > CORRECT NAME OF TOOL COULD ALSO BE 'ADPKD' | A Global Online Platform on the Management of Children With ADPKD | Autosomal Dominant Polycystic Kidney Disease (ADPKD) is the most common monogenic cause of kidney failure, affecting more than 1 in 400 to 1000 live births and approximately 13 million individuals worldwide, representing a major socio-economic medical problem in the world | Currently, there is no definitive curative treatment | ADPedKD, initiated by Djalila Mekahli (Leuven, Belgium) and Max Liebau (Cologne, Germany), is a international, longitudinal registry including ADPKD patients followed up from childhood
name: ADPedKD
